definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: This is Iceland, a land of fire and ice.
sentences.chinese: 这就是冰岛，一个冰火交织的极致王国。

sentences.english: Working at Huisman China means working on a high level.
sentences.chinese: 在豪氏威马，意味着工作到极致。

sentences.english: To give yourself the best possible chance of playing to your potential, you must prepare for every eventuality.
sentences.chinese: 要将潜能发挥到极致，须为任何可能性做好准备。

sentences.english: We must exploit tactical surprise to the maxima.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须发挥战术的奇袭效果到极致。

sentences.english: At 35-inches wide, considerably wider than any other conventional First Class seat.
sentences.chinese: 英吋，比传统头等舱更为宽大，让您尽享极致奢华。

sentences.english: They took a commendable anti-ageist policy to extremes.
sentences.chinese: 他们将反年龄歧视这一值得称赞的政策推向了极致。

sentences.english: Dr Hall and Dr Hänsch, meanwhile, are responsible for taking the art of measurement to new extremes.
sentences.chinese: 同时，霍尔和亨施博士使测量技术达到了新的极致。

sentences.english: Effort, and our all-powerful, perfect details to make us the ultimate play.
sentences.chinese: 努力用心使我们无所不能，细节完美使我们极致发挥。

sentences.english: Milton had borrowed this claim for an absolute originality.
sentences.chinese: 弥尔顿为了追求极致的创新而借用了这一说法。

sentences.english: Ultimate comfort without feeling greasy, not oily.
sentences.chinese: 极致舒适无油腻感，不泛油光。

sentences.english: Push your creativity to the breaking point. Your best ideas will be just beyond it
sentences.chinese: 把你的创造力发挥到极致，你的金点子就在那后面。

sentences.english: Elfloving creations of stunning elegance and captivating originality.
sentences.chinese: 伊芙洛林的作品兼具极致典雅与迷人创意。

sentences.english: The intensively colored classic furniture with superb elegance and nobility.
sentences.chinese: 极致优雅，贵气袭人的厚妆幻彩经典家具。

sentences.english: The Zero-Degree machine expresses an extreme functionality through the combination of its parts.
sentences.chinese: 零度机器透过其部件的组合传达着一种极致的功能性。

sentences.english: Thirdly, try to make the best use of the knowledge learned during college.
sentences.chinese: 再次，试着将自己在校园里的所学所得发挥到极致。

sentences.english: You lonly get one life. Don't you want to make it the best one possible?
sentences.chinese: 你的生命只有一次，你为什么不尽力活到极致呢？

definition: lit. extreme saturation (idiom)/fig. vividly and thoroughly/in great detail/without restraint/(of a performance) brilliant
to reach great heights (in technical skills or scholastic achievements)
lit. the stove fire has turned bright green (allusion to Daoist alchemy) (idiom)/fig. (of an art, a technique etc) brought to the point of perfection
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
perfect (idiom); perfection/the best of all possible worlds/as good as it gets
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
